title: Lasso and Elastic Net
description: In this tutorial, we will learn about Lasso and Elastic Net, which are techniques used for linear regression and implemented using a coordinate descent. We will learn how to compute regularization paths using the Lasso and Elastic Net, and how to display the results using matplotlib.

meta.title: Lasso and Elastic Net: Mastering Linear Regression Techniques
meta.description: Learn about Lasso and Elastic Net, powerful techniques for linear regression using coordinate descent.
meta.keywords: Lasso, Elastic Net, Linear Regression, Coordinate Descent, Regularization Path
